verses.verse: And it came to <S%H1961>pass<s%> in <S%H1992>those<s%> <S%H3117>days,<s%> that the <S%H6430>Philistines<s%> gathered <S%H6908>together<s%> <S%H853><s%> their <S%H4264>armies<s%> for <S%H6635>warfare,<s%> to <S%H3898>fight<s%> with <S%H3478>Israel.<s%> And <S%H397>Achish<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> <S%H1732>David,<s%> Know thou <S%H3045>assuredly,<s%> <S%H3045><s%> <S%H3588>that<s%> thou shalt go <S%H3318>out<s%> <S%H854>with<s%> me to <S%H4264>battle,<s%> <S%H859>thou<s%> and thy <S%H376>men.<s%>

And <S%H1732>David<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> <S%H413>to<s%> <S%H397>Achish,<s%> <S%H3651>Surely<s%> <S%H859>thou<s%> shalt <S%H3045>know<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H834>what<s%> thy <S%H5650>servant<s%> can <S%H6213>do.<s%> And <S%H397>Achish<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> <S%H413>to<s%> <S%H1732>David,<s%> <S%H3651>Therefore<s%> will I <S%H7760>make<s%> thee <S%H8104>keeper<s%> of mine <S%H7218>head<s%> <S%H3605>forever.<s%> <S%H3117><s%>

Now <S%H8050>Samuel<s%> was <S%H4191>dead,<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H3478>Israel<s%> had <S%H5594>lamented<s%> him, and <S%H6912>buried<s%> him in <S%H7414>Ramah,<s%> even in his own <S%H5892>city.<s%> And <S%H7586>Saul<s%> had put <S%H5493>away<s%> those that had familiar <S%H178>spirits,<s%> and the <S%H3049>wizards,<s%> out of the <S%H4480>land.<s%> <S%H776><s%>

And the <S%H6430>Philistines<s%> gathered themselves <S%H6908>together,<s%> and <S%H935>came<s%> and <S%H2583>pitched<s%> in <S%H7766>Shunem:<s%> and <S%H7586>Saul<s%> gathered all Israel <S%H6908>together,<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H3605><s%> <S%H3478><s%> and they <S%H2583>pitched<s%> in <S%H1533>Gilboa.<s%>

And when <S%H7586>Saul<s%> <S%H7200>saw<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H4264>host<s%> of the <S%H6430>Philistines,<s%> he was <S%H3372>afraid,<s%> and his <S%H3820>heart<s%> <S%H3966>greatly<s%> <S%H2729>trembled.<s%>

And when <S%H7586>Saul<s%> <S%H7592>inquired<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H6030>answered<s%> him <S%H3808>not,<s%> <S%H1571>neither<s%> by <S%H2472>dreams,<s%> <S%H1571>nor<s%> by <S%H224>Urim,<s%> <S%H1571>nor<s%> by <S%H5030>prophets.<s%>

Then <S%H559>said<s%> <S%H7586>Saul<s%> unto his <S%H5650>servants,<s%> <S%H1245>Seek<s%> me a <S%H802>woman<s%> that <S%H1172>hath<s%> a familiar <S%H178>spirit,<s%> that I may <S%H1980>go<s%> <S%H413>to<s%> her, and <S%H1875>inquire<s%> of her. And his <S%H5650>servants<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> <S%H413>to<s%> him, <S%H2009>Behold,<s%> there is a <S%H802>woman<s%> that <S%H1172>hath<s%> a familiar <S%H178>spirit<s%> at <S%H5874>Endor.<s%>

And <S%H7586>Saul<s%> disguised <S%H2664>himself,<s%> and put <S%H3847>on<s%> <S%H312>other<s%> <S%H899>raiment,<s%> and <S%H1931>he<s%> <S%H1980>went,<s%> and <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H376>men<s%> <S%H5973>with<s%> him, and they <S%H935>came<s%> <S%H413>to<s%> the <S%H802>woman<s%> by <S%H3915>night:<s%> and he <S%H559>said,<s%> I pray <S%H4994>thee,<s%> <S%H7080>divine<s%> unto me by the familiar <S%H178>spirit,<s%> and <S%H5927>bring<s%> me him <S%H853>up,<s%> <S%H834>whom<s%> I shall <S%H559>name<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> thee.

And the <S%H802>woman<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> him, <S%H2009>Behold,<s%> <S%H859>thou<s%> <S%H3045>knowest<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H834>what<s%> <S%H7586>Saul<s%> hath <S%H6213>done,<s%> <S%H834>how<s%> he hath cut <S%H3772>off<s%> <S%H853><s%> those that have familiar <S%H178>spirits,<s%> and the <S%H3049>wizards,<s%> out <S%H4480>of<s%> the <S%H776>land:<s%> <S%H4100>wherefore<s%> then layest <S%H859>thou<s%> a <S%H5367>snare<s%> for my <S%H5315>life,<s%> to cause me to <S%H4191>die?<s%>

And <S%H7586>Saul<s%> <S%H7650>swore<s%> to her by the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> As the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H2416>liveth,<s%> there shall <S%H518>no<s%> <S%H5771>punishment<s%> <S%H7136>happen<s%> to thee for <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H1697>thing.<s%>

Then <S%H559>said<s%> the <S%H802>woman,<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H4130>Whom<s%> shall I bring <S%H5927>up<s%> unto thee? And he <S%H559>said,<s%> Bring me <S%H5927>up<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H8050>Samuel.<s%>

And when the <S%H802>woman<s%> <S%H7200>saw<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H8050>Samuel,<s%> she <S%H2199>cried<s%> with a <S%H1419>loud<s%> <S%H6963>voice:<s%> and the <S%H802>woman<s%> <S%H559>spoke<s%> <S%H413>to<s%> <S%H7586>Saul,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> <S%H4100>Why<s%> hast thou <S%H7411>deceived<s%> me? for <S%H859>thou<s%> art <S%H7586>Saul.<s%>

And the <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> unto her, Be <S%H408>not<s%> <S%H3372>afraid:<s%> <S%H3588>for<s%> <S%H4100>what<s%> <S%H7200>sawest<s%> thou? And the <S%H802>woman<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> <S%H7586>Saul,<s%> I <S%H7200>saw<s%> <S%H430>gods<s%> <S%H5927>ascending<s%> out <S%H4480>of<s%> the <S%H776>earth.<s%>

And he <S%H559>said<s%> unto her, <S%H4100>What<s%> <S%H8389>form<s%> is he of? And she <S%H559>said,<s%> An <S%H2205>old<s%> <S%H376>man<s%> cometh <S%H5927>up;<s%> and <S%H1931>he<s%> is <S%H5844>covered<s%> with a <S%H4598>mantle.<s%> And <S%H7586>Saul<s%> <S%H3045>perceived<s%> <S%H3588>that<s%> it was <S%H8050>Samuel,<s%> and <S%H1931>he<s%> <S%H6915>stooped<s%> with his <S%H639>face<s%> to the <S%H776>ground,<s%> and bowed <S%H7812>himself.<s%>

And <S%H8050>Samuel<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> <S%H413>to<s%> <S%H7586>Saul,<s%> <S%H4100>Why<s%> hast thou <S%H7264>disquieted<s%> me, to bring me <S%H5927>up?<s%> <S%H853><s%> And <S%H7586>Saul<s%> <S%H559>answered,<s%> I am <S%H3966>sore<s%> <S%H6887>distressed;<s%> for the <S%H6430>Philistines<s%> make <S%H3898>war<s%> against me, and <S%H430>God<s%> is <S%H5493>departed<s%> <S%H4480>from<s%> <S%H5921><s%> me, and <S%H6030>answereth<s%> me <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H5750>more,<s%> <S%H1571>neither<s%> <S%H3027>by<s%> <S%H5030>prophets,<s%> <S%H1571>nor<s%> by <S%H2472>dreams:<s%> therefore I have <S%H7121>called<s%> thee, that thou mayest make <S%H3045>known<s%> unto me <S%H4100>what<s%> I shall <S%H6213>do.<s%>

Then <S%H559>said<s%> <S%H8050>Samuel,<s%> <S%H4100>Wherefore<s%> then dost thou <S%H7592>ask<s%> of me, seeing the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> is <S%H5493>departed<s%> <S%H4480>from<s%> <S%H5921><s%> thee, and is <S%H1961>become<s%> thine <S%H6145>enemy?<s%>

And the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> hath <S%H6213>done<s%> to him, <S%H834>as<s%> he <S%H1696>spoke<s%> <S%H3027>by<s%> me: for the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> hath <S%H7167>rent<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H4467>kingdom<s%> out of thine <S%H4480>hand,<s%> <S%H3027><s%> and <S%H5414>given<s%> it to thy <S%H7453>neighbor,<s%> even to David: <S%H1732><s%>

Because <S%H834><s%> thou <S%H8085>obeyedst<s%> <S%H3808>not<s%> the <S%H6963>voice<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> <S%H3808>nor<s%> <S%H6213>executedst<s%> his <S%H2740>fierce<s%> <S%H639>wrath<s%> upon <S%H6002>Amalek,<s%> <S%H5921>therefore<s%> <S%H3651><s%> hath the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H6213>done<s%> <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H1697>thing<s%> unto thee <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H3117>day.<s%>

Moreover <S%H1571><s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> will also <S%H5414>deliver<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H5973>with<s%> thee into the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of the <S%H6430>Philistines:<s%> and <S%H4279>tomorrow<s%> shalt <S%H859>thou<s%> and thy <S%H1121>sons<s%> be <S%H5973>with<s%> me: the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H1571>also<s%> shall <S%H5414>deliver<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H4264>host<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> into the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of the <S%H6430>Philistines.<s%>

Then <S%H7586>Saul<s%> <S%H5307>fell<s%> <S%H4116>straightway<s%> all <S%H4393>along<s%> <S%H6967><s%> on the <S%H776>earth,<s%> and was <S%H3966>sore<s%> <S%H3372>afraid,<s%> because of the <S%H4480>words<s%> <S%H1697><s%> of <S%H8050>Samuel:<s%> <S%H1571>and<s%> there <S%H1961>was<s%> <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H3581>strength<s%> in him; <S%H3588>for<s%> he had <S%H398>eaten<s%> <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H3899>bread<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H3117>day,<s%> nor <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H3915>night.<s%>

And the <S%H802>woman<s%> <S%H935>came<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> <S%H7586>Saul,<s%> and <S%H7200>saw<s%> <S%H3588>that<s%> he was <S%H3966>sore<s%> <S%H926>troubled,<s%> and <S%H559>said<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> him, <S%H2009>Behold,<s%> thine <S%H8198>handmaid<s%> hath <S%H8085>obeyed<s%> thy <S%H6963>voice,<s%> and I have <S%H7760>put<s%> my <S%H5315>life<s%> in my <S%H3709>hand,<s%> and have <S%H8085>hearkened<s%> <S%H853>unto<s%> thy <S%H1697>words<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> thou <S%H1696>spokest<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> me.

Now <S%H6258><s%> therefore, I pray <S%H4994>thee,<s%> <S%H8085>hearken<s%> <S%H859>thou<s%> <S%H1571>also<s%> unto the <S%H6963>voice<s%> of thine <S%H8198>handmaid,<s%> and let me <S%H7760>set<s%> a <S%H6595>morsel<s%> of <S%H3899>bread<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> thee; and <S%H398>eat,<s%> that thou mayest <S%H1961>have<s%> <S%H3581>strength,<s%> <S%H3588>when<s%> thou <S%H1980>goest<s%> on thy <S%H1870>way.<s%>

But he <S%H3985>refused,<s%> and <S%H559>said,<s%> I will <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H398>eat.<s%> But his <S%H5650>servants,<s%> together <S%H1571>with<s%> the <S%H802>woman,<s%> <S%H6555>compelled<s%> him; and he <S%H8085>hearkened<s%> unto their <S%H6963>voice.<s%> So he <S%H6965>arose<s%> from the <S%H4480>earth,<s%> <S%H776><s%> and <S%H3427>sat<s%> <S%H413>upon<s%> the <S%H4296>bed.<s%>

And the <S%H802>woman<s%> had a <S%H4770>fat<s%> <S%H5695>calf<s%> in the <S%H1004>house;<s%> and she <S%H4116>hasted,<s%> and <S%H2076>killed<s%> it, and <S%H3947>took<s%> <S%H7058>flour,<s%> and <S%H3888>kneaded<s%> it, and did <S%H644>bake<s%> unleavened <S%H4682>bread<s%> thereof:

And she <S%H5066>brought<s%> it <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H7586>Saul,<s%> and <S%H6440>before<s%> his <S%H5650>servants;<s%> and they did <S%H398>eat.<s%> Then they rose <S%H6965>up,<s%> and went <S%H1980>away<s%> <S%H1931>that<s%> <S%H3915>night.<s%>
